page.title: 07Social Activities.
page.content: A survey was carried out about peoples'attitudes to Youth Clubs.From those interviewed it was generally agreed that Youth Clubs were good for children and that there not enough in the area.The Wyvern Youth Club is in Arras Avenue. There is a social club in Green Lane. It is called the St.Helier Social Club and membership costs Â£3p.a. St.Peter's Church provides a meeting place for the Guides. Keep fit takes place at St.Teresa's. There is a Tweeddale Junior Activity Club for 9-13 year olds.This is held on Sunday mornings.Annual membership costs Â£1.00.The Tweeddale Youth Centre is for those of 14 and over. There are indoor and outdoor sports and other activities
